description: Pull up the 0AD pended claim using the control line in the claim application.
query: SELECT h.* FROM claim_headers h JOIN claim_lines l ON h.icn = l.icn WHERE l.condition_code = '0AD';

description: If the process date (Pend date) on the claim is 11 or more days from the current date, update the Explanation code to '__' and readjudicate the claim.
query: SELECT icn FROM claim_lines WHERE (julianday('now') - process_date) >= 11 and icn ='{icn}';

description: If the process date (Pend date) on the claim less than 11 days from the current date and receive date on the claim is equal to 20 days from current date, update the Explanation code to '__' and readjudicate the claim.
query: SELECT icn FROM claim_lines WHERE (julianday('now') - process_date) < 11 AND (julianday('now') - receive_date) = 20 and icn ='{icn}';

description: If the process date (Pend date) on the claim less than 11 days from the current date and receive date on the claim is less than 20 days from current date, allow the claim to pend for system process to complete.
query: SELECT icn FROM claim_lines WHERE (julianday('now') - process_date) < 11 AND (julianday('now') - receive_date) < 20 and icn ='{icn}';
